name: Null Reference Exception
description:
This game is a prototype that we made for our bachelors thesis in Digital Games at the Blekinge Institute of Technology.

The idea we had was to make a game that teaches game programming in C# and Unity, through a game made with the same tools. The player can interact with certain objects to view their sourcecode and change some aspects of it to complete puzzles and progress through the game.

The game is currently at a very early stage and therefore contains a lot of bugs and is missing several planned features.
